Name: Butterfly's Kiss
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Vanilla, hazelnut and cinnamon. Golden in colour with the odd gold flake from the cinnamon schnapps.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2003 at Bar Marmont, Los Angeles, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Butterfly's Kiss contains 302 calories
